Desc.eng: I help you, you help me.
I've decided to hunt that creature for you.
No greetings for me? Where are your manners?
I didnâ€™t send you away with a warding sign, did I? Well then.
I came on behalf of the village alchemist. I ask you to remove the curse you put on the poor man.
But that was a rightful curse! He said we were frauds! In the name of Science!
It might even be true. But he has suffered enough and I need his help.
Aye. We could come to an agreement, you know? You and me?
I have all sort of strange trophies from all sort of strange creatures, see? In my traveling cabinet of curiosities. I need the skull of the legendary Snowpelt.
